rooms.description: Spacious and welcoming entrance hall with Vastu-compliant north-east facing entrance for positive energy. Includes a wheelchair-accessible ramp.
Open living area styled in Art Deco with geometric patterns and vibrant colors, integrating farmhouse charm with modern amenities.
Dedicated home office space designed for productivity. Features ample natural light through south-facing windows to harness Vastu principles.
Functional kitchen incorporating both modern appliances and farmhouse elements, arranged according to Vastu guidelines with the main entrance to the north-east side.
Dedicated home theater area with acoustic design and integrated seating. Located on the west wall per Vastu for optimal energy flow and viewing experience.
